resources.string: Deciding what to read next? You’re in the right place. Tell the app what titles or genres you enjoy and it’ll give you surprisingly insightful recommendations.
An Android App that uses GoodReads API to retrieve details / data on books and their respective authors. This application is part of the Weekly Independent Project.
Let\'s Start! Which book are you currently reading?
Announcing the winners of the 2017 Goodreads Choice Awards, the only major book awards decided by readers.

Jack Torrance\'s new job at the Overlook Hotel is the perfect chance for a fresh start. As the off-season caretaker at the atmospheric old hotel, he\'ll have plenty of time to spend reconnecting with his family and working on his writing. But as the harsh winter weather sets in, the idyllic location feels ever more remote...
